narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Fastmed P.c. is a General Practice provider based in Durham, NC. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $5.5M in Medicaid payments across 174K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $5.5M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
